org.drip.measure.continuous

Class R1Multivariate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.measure.continuous.R1Multivariate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    R1MultivariateNormal

    public abstract class R1Multivariate
extends java.lang.Object
    R1Multivariate contains the Generalized Joint Multivariate R^1 Distributions.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
